text_2.eng: Balancing the money you earn with the money you need to spend is an important step in making a monthly budget. ğŸ“

rows.text_1_facilitator: Here is how you can build a monthly budget:

text_1_facilitator.eng: Here is how you can build a monthly budget:

rows.text_1_facilitator: ğŸ¨ Take the piece of paper from the monthly expenses activity that shows all the things you spend money on during a month.

rows.text_1_facilitator: ğŸ’° Add up all the money your family has available each month. This can be from a job, welfare grants, or even money sent to the family by other relatives.
